programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cochon du milieu) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Le cochon du milieu»Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (L'Ami des mers) S6 (n°10)
programme.desc: «L'Ami des mers»Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (No Time Like the Present Store) S3 (n°3)
programme.desc: «No Time Like the Present Store»At the Present Store, Joe's running a contest, whoever guesses the mystery present gets to unwrap it! What could be inside this special gift?! We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (L'équipe de construction de Blue) S3 (7/18)
programme.desc: «L'équipe de construction de Blue»Josh invites you to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré) S1 (3/21)
programme.desc: «Un phare dans la tempête / Le géant doré»When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le festival des fruits) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Le festival des fruits»The Fruit Festival: Santiago and his family team up to save the Fruit Festival when Enrique crashes the party and steals all the fruit! (S2, ep 6a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Tour Fishies) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Tour Fishies»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Sorry, Not Sorry) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Sorry, Not Sorry»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Jungle Penguins) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Jungle Penguins»Pups Save the Jungle Penguins: An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home! (S6, ep 1a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille) S4 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille»The dragon from Alex's favourite book comes to life and plays hide and seek in Adventure Bay. Alex can help get him back. Francois's trailer detaches and all of his reptiles and amphibians escape from their cage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»La famille de Peppa organise une excursion à la mer afin de bâtir des châteaux de sable sur la plage, mais à leur arrivée, il y a de la neige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Lorsque Peppa et George vont chez le dentiste pour une visite de contrôle, le docteur Eléphant leur dit que leurs dents sont saines et blanches. Mais celles du dinosaure de George ont besoin d'être nettoyées...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aquarium) S4 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'aquarium»The Aquarium: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium. With all the different fish surely Peppa can find a new friend for Goldie?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le nounours de la garderie) S4 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Le nounours de la garderie»George's New Dinosaur: George pays a visit to Mr Fox's Shop after his favourite toy, Mr Dinosaur breaks. With all the additional features surely Dino Roar is a good replacement?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»The Greedy Gobbler: While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! Then Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears! (S1, ep 67).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue au pays des dinosaures) S3 (6/18)
programme.desc: «Blue au pays des dinosaures»Blue's Dino Clues: It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the Skidoo Frame and starts to hatch! (S3, ep 2).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un abri pour la nuit / La Kermesse de la Grande Vallée) S4 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Un abri pour la nuit / La Kermesse de la Grande Vallée»Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Raise the Paw Patroller / Pups Save the Crows) S3 (25/26)
programme.desc: «Pups Raise the Paw Patroller / Pups Save the Crows»Daring Danny's at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear) S2 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear»Paddington helps to hatch an egg but it takes ages & when it finally cracks open, he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'mores) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «S'mores»S'Mores: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends. (S1, ep 4b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Jérémie le génie / L'acrobate) S3 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Jérémie le génie / L'acrobate»Rubble finds an old brass Jack in the Box, with a genie inside who grants him three wishes! // Francois Turbot is bravely walking a tightrope, but seagulls threaten to ruin his act. Time to call the PAW Patrol!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les pépites d'or / Le vol du Pat'patrouilleur) S3 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Les pépites d'or / Le vol du Pat'patrouilleur»When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, it's a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur / Baby, super requin) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur / Baby, super requin»Goldie blames her missing treats on a monster. // Vigo's plan to turn everyfishy into babies backfires.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les pierres de pouvoir) S2
programme.desc: «Les pierres de pouvoir»When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'anniversaire d'Anani) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire d'Anani»Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toile d'araignée) S4 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La toile d'araignée»Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are in Daddy Pig's study, and they see that it is a complete mess and full of spider webs. They see a spider, which Peppa names Mister Skinnylegs, but Mummy Pig is afraid and tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it. They set out to find a new home for Mister Skinnylegs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family are staying at Cousin Chloe's house. After a long day everyone is tired and wants to go to sleep. But baby Alexander's crying is keeping everyone awake!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bac à Sable) S4 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bac à Sable»Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»Every day is an adventure for Peppa Pig! With her family and friends there's always something to smile about, and a whole world of things to discover!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les miroirs) S4 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Les miroirs»George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le super skateboard) S7 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le super skateboard»It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les chevaliers en armure) S7 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les chevaliers en armure»When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le Ballon dirigeable / Le Concours du Meilleur Chili) S4 (1/26)
programme.desc: «Le Ballon dirigeable / Le Concours du Meilleur Chili»Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le bébé Pingouin / Le spectacle des chats) S4 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le bébé Pingouin / Le spectacle des chats»Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Shark Day's Night) S1 (22/28)
programme.desc: «A Shark Day's Night»A Shark Day's Night: The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. (S1, ep 20a).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News) S2 (13/27)
programme.desc: «Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News»The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.desc: «Le cochon du milieu»Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.desc: «Tour Fishies»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.desc: «Sorry, Not Sorry»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.desc: «Pups Save the Jungle Penguins»Pups Save the Jungle Penguins: An ice floe carrying three penguins lands in the jungle. Now the pups must get them back to their frosty home! (S6, ep 1a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille) S4 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La partie de cache-cache / Des bébêtes en vadrouille»The dragon from Alex's favourite book comes to life and plays hide and seek in Adventure Bay. Alex can help get him back. Francois's trailer detaches and all of his reptiles and amphibians escape from their cage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mer, soleil et neige) S3 (30/52)
programme.desc: «Mer, soleil et neige»La famille de Peppa organise une excursion à la mer afin de bâtir des châteaux de sable sur la plage, mais à leur arrivée, il y a de la neige...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Lorsque Peppa et George vont chez le dentiste pour une visite de contrôle, le docteur Eléphant leur dit que leurs dents sont saines et blanches. Mais celles du dinosaure de George ont besoin d'être nettoyées...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'aquarium) S4 (31/52)
programme.desc: «L'aquarium»The Aquarium: Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium. With all the different fish surely Peppa can find a new friend for Goldie?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La voiture de course de George) S4 (32/52)
programme.desc: «La voiture de course de George»It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»The Little Boat: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Everywhere at Once) S1 (n°72)
programme.desc: «Everywhere at Once»Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art) S9 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art»Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime) S1 (14/15)
programme.desc: «L'attaque des drones / Pluie de slime»Steel's automated delivery drones create chaos in the city and forest. Kai has to disable the drones real quick! // When Sir Steel's Slime Machine starts shooting slime everywhere, Bobbi has to pilot the Deer Squad Rescue Carrier to save the city.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights) S2 (19/20)
programme.desc: «Den Build Disaster / Winter Lights»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals. // Lola's plan to help a family of hedgehogs over the winter doesn't go to plan when Sir Steel wants to brighten things up.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Cranberry Cookies) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Cranberry Cookies»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur) S3 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Le match de foot / Le collier porte-bonheur»Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent) S3 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Alex et sa Mini Patrouille / Alex a perdu sa dent»Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol and recruits Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. But when their actions attract the attention of a hungry eagle, Alex has to rescue his own team. // Alex loses his first tooth... then really loses it. He can't find it anywhere! The Paw Patrol is hot on the tooth's trail, and everyone is determined to find it before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (L'histoire des deux Tomás) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «L'histoire des deux Tomás»It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Les épreuves du pirate protecteur) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les épreuves du pirate protecteur»On the first anniversary of becoming Pirate Protector, Santiago must complete a series of challenges meant to test his abilities and prove he's worthy all without the help of his tools or best mateys.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La balle rebondissante) S2 (48/52)
programme.desc: «La balle rebondissante»Peppa and George play with the ball until Suzie comes and they play tennis with it. But George doesn't like that. Fortunately, the friends come by and play a game of football. But a referee must be involved!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Maman Pig travaille) S1 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Maman Pig travaille»Peppa accidentally crashes Mama Pig's computer. Papa Pig is trying to get it right.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le retardataire) S4 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le retardataire»The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les jeux de plein air) S4 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Les jeux de plein air»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les chevaliers en armure) S7 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Les chevaliers en armure»When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La course du paquet-cadeau doré) S6 (12/24)
programme.desc: «La course du paquet-cadeau doré»Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro) S4 (6/26)
programme.desc: «Le gâteau de Jake / Skier comme un pro»Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the Paw Patrol.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue) S4 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de nourriture / La grande roue»Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! // Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise) S2 (8/13)
programme.desc: «The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise»Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.
